content: i find adding a chain makes the next row easier this stitch will also be made in the v of the previous row 6 single_crochet in off-white since you are making the opening you cannot catch the previous off-white yarn under a few yellow stitches it will just hide in the pokeball after the zipper is added ending text highlight as the color changes are easier now 42 round 12 4 single_crochet in off-white single_crochet in off-white but insert the hook into the lower v of the off-white stitch in the previous row 30 yellow single_crochet in the bottom bumps of the chain stitches like you did before catch the off-white yarn under the first ~3 of the yellow stitches later you can cut this yarn near where its hiding under the stitches and use a tapestry needle to weave in the end securing the otherside which is the other leg of the v near the opening single_crochet in off-white but insert the hook into the lower v of the off-white stitch in the previous row 6 single_crochet in off-white 42 round 13-14 4 single_crochet in off-white single_crochet in off-white but insert the hook into the lower v of the off-white stitch in the previous row 30 yellow stitches single_crochet in off-white but insert the hook into the lower v of the off-white stitch in the previous row 6 single_crochet in off-white 42 round 15 4 single_crochet in off-white single_crochet in off-white but insert the hook into the lower v of the off-white stitch in the previous row 3 single_crochet in yellow decrease in yellow x 6 single_crochet in yellow single_crochet in off-white and insert the hook into the lower v of the off-white stitch in the previous row when you make the next single_crochet it will feel like you are skipping a stitch 5 single_crochet in off-white 36 round 16 3 single_crochet in off-white single_crochet in off-white but insert the hook into the lower v of the off-white stitch in the previous row 4 single_crochet in yellow 17 half_double_crochet 5 single_crochet in yellow single_crochet in off-white and insert the hook into the lower v of the off-white stitch in the previous row when you make the next single_crochet it will feel like you are skipping a stitch 4 single_crochet in off-white 36 round 17 4 single_crochet in off-white single_crochet in off-white but insert the hook into the lower v of the off-white stitch in the previous row single_crochet in yellow decrease in yellow 3 single_crochet in yellow decrease in yellow x 5 single_crochet in yellow single_crochet in off-white and insert the hook into the lower v of the off-white stitch in the previous row when you make the next single_crochet it will feel like you are skipping a stitch 3 single_crochet in off-white 30 round 18 4 single_crochet in off-white single_crochet in off-white but insert the hook into the lower v of the off-white stitch in the previous row 4 single_crochet in yellow 13 half_double_crochet 5 single_crochet in yellow
